item.description:
Last minute event!  Outdoor concert - FREE - at River Bend Farm!

Look for me in my purple chair with my feet up!

 

Music starts at 3:30 pm and ends at 5:00 pm.

I'll be there by 3:00 pm - join me!

 

The Blackstone Valley Community Concert Band (BVCCB)is a non-profit organization made up of musicians, young and old, from throughout the Valley and neighboring communities.

Over the years, the BVCCB has become a Valley favorite, achieving a solid reputation through a display of their fine musicianship and crowd pleasing performances. They provide a popular variety of concert band repertoire to their audience, from Show Tunes to Sousa!

http://www.bvccband.org/
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Jacki under the big shaded tree closest to the paved lot.
item.name: OUTDOOR CONCERT - TODAY!
